page.title: 14SHOPPING IN BIRSTALL
page.content: Birstall is fortunate in having a wide variety of small shops. There are small groups on Kingsgate Ave. and Windmill Ave. but the main group is on Sibson Rd. Most of the daily needs can be bought locally. However, 2 years ago a large supermarket and shopping centre was built 2 miles away at{Beaumont Leys. When local shopkeepers were asked by us if their trade had been affected, most said, "Yes" but some were more concerned with Birstall:{"A poor {mixture of shops, too many chemists, {banks and building societies." One shop keeper commented,{"People {in Birstall want a personal, friendly {service. We can provide that." The manager of{International Stores said that he makes a point of walking around the supermarket talking to customers and checking the service.
